name: Cha-Cha Special 04/99 Demo
overview: A promotional demo disc that was released in the Benelux in April 1999, as the name might imply. It was sold with a pack of "Cha-Cha" chocolate biscuits in Belgium (and probably in France for the cities close to the border.) The only demo disc released exclusively in the Benelux. As such, it is the only demo disc to have the disclaimer, START+SELECT and RESET screens written in both Dutch and French. Playables: A Bug's Life Blood Lines Cool Boarders 3 Crash Bandicoot 3 Fluid Gran Turismo Ridge Racer Type 4 Spyro the Dragon Tekken 3 Videos: Cha-Cha commercial (French + Dutch) (Only viewable during bootup) OPSM Promo PlayStation Website Ridge Racer Type 4
